text:
Hello Everyone,

This is Jamil an Organic Search Manager at Cloudways. I'm contacting you today because I am preparing a video compilation of industry experts such as yourself in which they have to answer five simple questions related to COVID 19 pandemic.

The video will not take more than 15 minutes of your precious time but it can help many individuals and businesses get through these difficult times.

Your video will become the part of our official playlist and will also be listed on Cloudways blog
<https://www.cloudways.com/blog/experts-tips-to-help-your-business-survive-covid-19/>

For any questions, and questionnaire feel free to ask me.

attachments.title: Tips From Industry Experts to Help Individuals & Businesses Survive COVID-19
attachments.text: One of the biggest challenges the human race faced after World War II is COVID 19 pandemic. It ceased the whole world and locked people in their homes to avoid
attachments.fallback: The Official Cloudways Blog: Tips From Industry Experts to Help Individuals & Businesses Survive COVID-19

Hello Everyone,

This is Jamil an Organic Search Manager at Cloudways. I'm contacting you today because I am preparing a video compilation of industry experts such as yourself in which they have to answer five simple questions related to COVID 19 pandemic.

The video will not take more than 15 minutes of your precious time but it can help many individuals and businesses get through these difficult times.

Your video will become the part of our official playlist and will also be listed on Cloudways blog
For any questions, and questionnaire feel free to ask me.

text:
Even in the current climate, a few industries are growing faster than they used to. 

You can use that information to adapt your content/SEO plan for the next few months:

1. Figure out your major verticals

2. Pick the verticals that are growing/ unaffected 

3. Find trending KWs for that vertical using a tool like Exploding Topics

4. Write helpful content

5. Optimize, optimize, optimize!
